articles.title: Kim Yong Nam meets Chongryon officials
"Song Dedicated to 21st Century" created
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam meets Chongryon officials 
    Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and conversed at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today in a compatriotic atmosphere with Kwon Sun Hwi, vice-chairman of the central standing committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, and the leading members of the art troupe of Korean schoolchildren in Japan headed by its department director Song Kun Hak.
